params.name: vocab_size
params.description: Vocabulary size of the MusicgenMelodyDecoder model. Defines the number of different tokens that can berepresented by the inputs_ids passed when calling MusicgenMelodyDecoder.

params.name: max_position_embeddings
params.description: The maximum sequence length that this model might ever be used with. Typically, set this to something largejust in case (e.g., 512 or 1024 or 2048).

params.name: num_hidden_layers
params.description: Number of decoder layers.

params.name: ffn_dim
params.description: Dimensionality of the intermediate (often named feed-forward) layer in the Transformer block.

params.name: num_attention_heads
params.description: Number of attention heads for each attention layer in the Transformer block.

params.name: layerdrop
params.description: The LayerDrop probability for the decoder. See the [LayerDrop paper](see https://arxiv.org/abs/1909.11556)for more details.

params.name: use_cache
params.description: Whether the model should return the last key/values attentions (not used by all models)

params.name: activation_function
params.description: The non-linear activation function (function or string) in the decoder and pooler. If string, gelu,relu, silu and gelu_new are supported.

params.name: hidden_size
params.description: Dimensionality of the layers and the pooler layer.

params.name: dropout
params.description: The dropout probability for all fully connected layers in the embeddings, text_encoder, and pooler.

params.name: attention_dropout
params.description: The dropout ratio for the attention probabilities.

params.name: activation_dropout
params.description: The dropout ratio for activations inside the fully connected layer.

params.name: initializer_factor
params.description: The standard deviation of the truncated_normal_initializer for initializing all weight matrices.

params.name: scale_embedding
params.description: Scale embeddings by diving by sqrt(hidden_size).

params.name: num_codebooks
params.description: The number of parallel codebooks forwarded to the model.

params.name: audio_channels
params.description: Number of audio channels used by the model (either mono or stereo). Stereo models generate a separateaudio stream for the left/right output channels. Mono models generate a single audio stream output.

params.name: pad_token_id
params.description: The id of the padding token.

params.name: bos_token_id
params.description: The id of the beginning-of-sequence token.

params.name: eos_token_id
params.description: The id of the end-of-sequence token.

params.name: tie_word_embeddings
params.description: Whether to tie word embeddings with the text encoder.
